title: Slingback Clogs
subtitle: The ideal shoes for everyday wear
description: These cloggs are a great around-the-house and running errand shoes: comfortable, hard-wearing and slip-on. The heel is secured with a slingback strap that supports you as you walk, whilst the top of the shoes has a sturdy lining that has some holes for ventilation. The sole of these clogs is made from a thick, cushioned material that is easy to walk on and provides some comfort. Just slip on and you are ready to go out on errands or for a quick trip out. Pair with joggers, shorts or a hoodie for a casual everyday look.

title: Panelled Low-Top Trainers
subtitle: Archive a sporty look from head to toe with these trainers
description: When it comes to a sporty or sports-casual look, it's important to pay attention right down to the shoes. The right pair of trainers can take an outfit from the lower leagues to the championships. These low top trainers are simple but effective additions to your wardrobe that can pair with most outfits. The heel and insole are padded for comfort and an easy fit that can keep up with you if running or playing sports. The laces and front of the shoe maintain the simple style, with some air holes towards the front, allowing for more aeration on the inside.

title: Panelled Low-Top Trainers

subtitle: The slip-on sandals that never go out of style!

title: Smart Derby Shoes
subtitle: Do the smart thing with these derby shoes
description: It’s time to level up your style game with these super smart derby shoes. Everyone needs a failsafe pair of shoes to smarten up their attire. Featuring a classic derby design with a rounded toe, you really can’t go wrong with a pair of these. The slight heel ties together this traditional formal shoe. So, put your best foot forward and slip on a pair of these smart fresh derby shoes. Perfect for smart casual events with jeans and a shirt or for when you’re fully suiting up.Do not wash

title: Chunky Pool Slides

title: Kem Low-Top Trainers
subtitle: Lace-up trainers - another classic from the Kem collection
description:
If you ask us, this is another winning style from the Kem collection here at Primark - let us introduce you to these low-top trainers. A simple silhouette that presents a low profile and stacked sole couples with a classic colourway to bring you the kicks that’ll take you from running errands in style to casual meet ups with friends. They feature heel counters trimmed with exposed stitching, padded collars, lace-up fastenings and round toes, while a subtle texture on the sole helps to enhance traction. Feel free to team these trainers with anything from tailored trousers and a Cuban collar shirt for smart-casual ensembles that are curated with flecks of laid-back appeal, or keep things simple by opting for a coordinating loungewear set and these classically crafted shoes.Collection: Kem
Kem
Kem

title: Low-Top Chunky Trainers
subtitle: These trainers are sportswear with a bit of style
description: The contrasting panels on this trainer create a stylish, sporty design that can be worn in daily life and not just at the gym. These low-top shoes have a slightly thicker profile that creates a more everyday look. The upper is made to have a secure and comfortable feel, meeting the sole in a slender, waved line for a sleek look. Inside, a cushioned bottom keeps the foot comfortable whilst walking, running or jumping. Ideal to go with your chosen gym wear, these trainers would also work at work or on a casual occasion.

subtitle: These trainers bring effortless style and take 2 seconds to slip-on - winning!
description: Do not wash

title: Essential Colour Flip Flops
subtitle: Whether home or away, slip into sensational comfort with these essential flip flops!
description: There's no flip flopping around the fact that these are the ultimate sunny day shoe! Their toe post style is one you can rely on year after year, while their understanded look means you can pair them with swimwear, shorts, jeans, joggers and everything in between for a chic summer ensemble. Finished with a textured strap, these are great for popping in your suitcase and slipping on when you want that laid-back look!

title: Slip-on Low Top Trainers
subtitle: Slip on these great trainers
description: These woven trainers bring a casual style to this wardrobe classic. Perfect for running errands or heading out for a laidback evening with friends, we think these shoes might just be a new staple of your look. Coming in two colours and featuring a pull tab on the heel, decorative laces and chunky soles, these shoes are perfectly paired with chinos or cargos. Just slip them on and head out.

title: Faux Leather Footbed Sandals
subtitle: The slip-on sandals that never go out of style!
description: These buckle sandals have been a fashion statement for the past decades, and we can certainly see why! Fashioned with a faux leather composition, two buckle straps and an open toe silhouette, these slip-on sandals are a must-have! Ideal for summer trips abroad or wearing in the house, these versatile sandals are the essential footwear you can confide in for years to come! Why not pair them with our range of patterned socks, a cross-body bag and a shorts and shirt co-ord for your next summer barbecue? How will you be rocking yours?

title: Kem Low-Top Trainers
subtitle: Lace-up trainers - another classic from the Kem collection
description:
If you ask us, this is another winning style from the Kem collection here at Primark - let us introduce you to these low-top trainers. A simple silhouette that presents a low profile and stacked sole couples with a classic white colourway to bring you the kicks that’ll take you from running errands in style to casual meet ups with friends. They feature heel counters trimmed with exposed stitching, padded collars, lace-up fastenings and round toes, while a subtle texture on the sole helps to enhance traction. Feel free to team these white trainers with anything from tailored trousers and a Cuban collar shirt for smart-casual ensembles that are curated with flecks of laid-back appeal, or keep things simple by opting for a coordinating loungewear set and these classically crafted shoes.Collection: Kem

title: High-Top Basketball Trainers
subtitle: These sporty high-top sneakers are great on or off the court
description: Shoes can be the perfect finishing slamdunk when desiring a sporty look, and these trainers could be the option for you. This pair have a simple but effective design that fits well with most athleisure ensembles. Featuring a round toe, they have a lace-up fastening, a rear heel tab, panelling on the upper, and a rubber sole. Pair these kicks with activewear co-ords when going out to play sports, or wear them with your best joggers and shirts for a casual look.

title: Stripe Strap Pool Slides
subtitle: These slides are a comfy choice for everyday wear- a real star in stripes!
description: Pool slides are the perfect casual shoe to slip into whether you're holidaying, getting work done around the house or garden, or even popping to the shops on those off-duty days! Crafted with a thick, cushioned sole, this style features a moulded footbed for improved comfort while the wide strap which features a bold stripe print helps them feel secure as you go about your day. Pair with shorts and a light tee for a beach-ready look or with your most comfortable clothes for those last minute or low-key missions- either way, we see these being a style you opt for often. Buckles and laces, who?Fire Safety: WARNING! Keep away from fire

title: Chunky Penny Loafers
subtitle: Dandy footwear for dapper fellows.
description: Dandy and dapper, penny loafers are your new wear-with-everything shoes. The slip-on style has been having a moment — not only to be worn with smart suiting, à la the olden days, but all your outfits to enjoy their smartening credentials. Tailored trousers and sweater vests, jeans and a polo knit — every single ensemble is elevated by a chunky loafer. Newsflash for any lazy dressers out there! Loafers will single-handedly maketh a look. With an almond-shaped toe, signature flat strap and — *drumroll please* — convenient lack of laces, ours more than earn their place in your footwear collection.

title: Smart Derby Shoes
subtitle: Do the smart thing with these derby shoes
description: It’s time to level up your style game with these super smart derby shoes. Everyone needs a failsafe pair of shoes to smarten up their attire. title: Slip-On Sock Sports Shoes
subtitle: These trainers make slipping into an active look easier than ever!
description: Whether you're on the court, out running, or just embracing the look, these trainers are sure to be an asset to your active lifestyle! With a timeless black and grey design, these slip-on sock trainers bring a sporty style to your rotation while offering the breathability, comfort and flexibility of a stretch fabric upper, made all the more easy to get into thanks to the dual pull tabs, as well as the padded feel of the thick sole. You can wear yours with your gym outfits or competitive sportswear to score more than just style points or create a more casual streetwear look by pairing these with cargos or denim- either way we have a feeling they'll be first place in your wardrobe!

title: Knitted Lace-Up Trainers
subtitle: Liking these cosy, knitted trainers? That tracks
description: Cosy kicks will always have a place in our repertoire. Perfect for slipping on when a day of errands lies ahead, donning for a light bite with friends or sporting on long-haul trips, these knitted lace-up trainers can do it all! Constructed to a low-top profile, these shoes boast a fabric upper with heel tabs for easy on-off access, lace-up fastenings and round toes, while chunky midsoles and subtly textured outsoles complete the design with sports-infused cues. We see these trainers pairing effortlessly with casual joggers, an oversized hoodie and long puffer coat.

title: Chunky Penny Loafers
subtitle: A smart shoe with a dapper look
description: Ideal for days at the office, formal occasions or when you just want a smarter look, these loafers are your next big shoewear staple. This slip-on style embraces the look and feel of the days when tailored looks were all the rage. Coming with a saddle strap and thick sole, these shoes elevate any look to new levels of chic. Pair with formal trousers and a suit for a really slick look or with jeans and a polo shirt for a more casual feel – your newest shoewear essential.

title: Round Toe Lace-Up Shoes
subtitle: Chunky shoes with smart appeal? Tick
description: Presented to a polished finish, these round toe lace-up shoes are calling your name. Set atop chunky soles with lug details, these smart shoes feature lace-up fastenings to the front, smooth vamps and subtle topstitching frames the round toes. Sophisticated and pared-back, these black shoes are designed to complement an assortment of carefully curated looks. Simply couple with a classic Oxford shirt (sleeves rolled up, if you’re so inclined) and a pair of tailored trousers for office-ready attire.

title: Performance Running Trainers
subtitle: These trainers are your new go-to fitness shoes!
description: Keep fit with these textile performance trainers! Fashioned with a lace tie fastening, low top silhouette and textile composition, these performance shoes are bound to become your new trusty footwear whether you wear them to the gym, or your daily errand run! Why not style them with our performance tees and shorts for your next fitness class or keep it casual with a tracksuit set on those off-duty days? Available in two stunning colourways, these trainers are ones to look out for on your next store visit. Pair them with our range of performance socks for the complete package! What’s not to love?

title: Keith Haring High-Top Trainers
subtitle: Trainers with Keith Haring's iconic pop art design
description:
We love this classic pair of canvas high-top trainers with a Keith Haring twist! Featuring the iconic heart pop art design by Keith Haring on the side, these canvas trainers are made for those with bold style. Giving us serious '90s vibes, pair these with shorts or baggy jeans and an oversized graphic T-shirt.Collection: Keith Haring

Crafted from faux suede for a sophisticated finish, these shoes feature an open toe design, two buckle straps and a contoured footbed to offer a comfier wearing experience. These can be worn with almost anything making them a versatile must have for home, the garden, and even on holiday!

title: Low-Top Canvas Trainers
subtitle: You can kick it with these casual low-top trainers
description: Having enjoyed must-have status for years, you’d be crazy to refuse these low-top canvas trainers from your collection. Undeniably casual and always an effortless style that can swiftly take you from running errands to meeting friends, these white canvas trainers showcase a low-top profile and lace-up design. Lightly padded collars, panelled detailing and round toes with a textured front midsole feature for a pleasant combination of style and function. Slip them on with slim fit jeans and a flannel shirt for a put-together, laid-back look or opt for a T-shirt and shirts when relaxed days are calling.

title: Two-tone Mesh Trainers
subtitle: A sporty addition to your footwear collection
description: Trainers are a great go-to in any wardrobe – great for sporty looks or varsity vibes. Coming in a white base colour with grey-toned mesh side panels, they’ll bring a cool, modern look to your wardrobe. The low-top design, cushioned heel, reflective stripes and pull tabs create an easy-fit shoe that is practical and stylish. Pair with jeans for a touch of Americana or shorts for a gym-ready outfit.

title: Chunky Lace-Up Shoes
subtitle: Smart lace-up shoes are always appropriate
description: Whether you’re a fan of smart dressing seven days a week or are seeking the perfect pair of shoes for office attire, we have just the thing! These chunky lace-up shoes are smart and stylish in equal measure. Rendered in a classic black colourway, they present a slip-on design with pared-back tongues, lace-up fastenings and raised seam details, which run around the edge of the vamp. The design is set atop chunky lug soles, ensuring these shoes are suitable for a range of terrain. A crisp shirt, vibrant tie, tailored trousers and this sleek pair of footwear are just meant to be.

title: Low-Top Hiking Trainers
subtitle: Stylish low-tops with a sportswear edge
description: Going for the sports chic vibe? These low-top hiking trainers will finish off the look nicely. They’ll be your go-to for meeting up with friends or going out for the day with family. Team with jeans, joggers or cargo trousers for a versatile daytime look.

title: Panelled Mesh Trainers
subtitle: Low-top trainers with a sports-infused kick
description: Sleek, suave and a little bit sporty, these panelled mesh trainers are certainly here to help you put your best foot forward...sartorially speaking. Rendered in a classic black hue (it really does pair with everything), these low-top trainers display panelled uppers with a mixture of smooth accents and mesh detailing for a suitably sporty sense, all while maintaining a fashion-forward feeling. They’re set atop thick midsoles and feature grosgrain tabs to the heel, padded tongues, black lace-up fastenings to the front and round toes.

title: Checked Slippers
subtitle: Top off your evening look from the feet up with these slippers
description: A set of pyjamas is never complete without slippers, and these checked house shoes are a great option. Outside these slippers display a black-and-white check pattern that brings a slightly modern yet casual look into your rotation. The material is designed to be warm, with enough flex not to restrict your toes as you walk around your home. Around the edges of the top line is a piped accent of a black quilted material that lines the inside to create a snug, comfortable fit. Pair with your favourite pyjamas or our matching set for a relaxed evening look that can only be enhanced with a snuggie and throw as you settle down for your favourite movie or show.

title: Lined Fabric Slippers
subtitle: A real treat for your feet

title: Mesh Sports Trainers
subtitle: Looking for the pair of shoes that can keep up with your active lifestyle?
description: When searching for the perfect sports shoes, it’s not just about performance – they must also look great! Crafted from a sturdy composition, pull tabs, mesh details and lace fastening, these kicks provide the support and comfort you need to tackle any challenge that comes your way. Whether you’re a fitness enthusiast, sports fanatic, or just looking for a comfy pair of trainers, this pair will have you feeling confident whether you style them with your gym kit for a workout or jeans and a tee on your daily errand runs!

title: Mesh Sports Trainers
subtitle: Looking for the pair of shoes that can keep up with your active lifestyle?
description: These sports trainers are designed to give you the support and comfort you need to tackle any challenge that comes your way! Crafted from a sturdy composition, pull tabs, mesh details and lace fastening, these kicks provide ample support for your everyday step! Not only are these shoes the best choice for any sport or activity, but they also boast a sleek and stylish design that’ll have you feeling confident whether you pair them with your gym kit for a workout or jeans and a tee on your daily errand runs!
